title: Samut Sakhon Province Stadium
text: Samut Sakhon Province Stadium () is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Samut%20Sakhon%20Province">Samut Sakhon Province</a>, <a href="Thailand">Thailand</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 3,500 people.
